basic.description: Specific properties of polymers (glass transition, crystallinity, polydispersity, etc) and their dependence on macromolecular structure and isomerism. Polymer synthesis overview: step and chain polymerization (free-radical, ionic and insertion mechanisms) and reactions on polymers. Examples of polymers and their uses. Offered alternating years with ENCH 425 (CHEM 425).
basic.subject: ENCH
basic.title: Polymer Chemistry

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ: CHEM 223 or ENCH 245 or CHEM 245 and registered in BSCE
